Exelente juego muy recomendable un juego que te puede dar 600 horas del tiron y que no te vas a aburrir un juego que revoluciono la industria hace ya mas de 10 años y sigue siendo uno de los juegos mas jugados del mundo (10)

counter-strike is a good game for the most part, adding characters and stuff to the half life franchise and universe... there are several canon discrepencies, but they can be ignored for the gameplay and overall storyline (and even how that fits into the orignal half life game :D)

overall its worth paying for and playing...
13 years play this game and i never get bored.
